description.en: Kodi provides its users with the first ever crypto based Entertainment Network. Parallel to this, Kodi is operating a one stop shop Advertisement/Marketing Agency known as ‘PITCH’, which will function as a subsidiary company. Both entities will encompass a use case that will directly benefit $KODI holders. This whitepaper provides a detailed description of the use case, tokenomics, team, the future plans of PITCH and its utility token ($KODI).
